attributes.action: STOP TERROR IN AFRICA BY ARMS TRADERS.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Congo, Somalia, Sierra Lion and other countries in africa suffer from arms traders directly linked to british companies making millions of pounds. They are responsible and have infuence in internal matters of poor countries. I would love to see this Barbarianism stop as many people have been killed with the trade. Gun Do Kill people People Do. Please Tony Do Something at list something good for Africa. Please
